Rulings.Base:
1. Removing "Necro Defender" from play is a cost.
2. This effect targets any 1 monster you control.
3. The effect of "Necro Defender" will be applied even if your opponent controls the target monster when this effect resolves.
4. The effect of "Necro Defender" will apply until the targeted monster leaves the field or is flipped face-down.
5. The player who activated the effect of "Necro Defender" is the player who won't take damage from battles involving the targeted monster.
6. If you use "Necro Defender" and the effect of "Stardust Phantom" on the same monster, apply the effect of "Necro Defender" if the targeted monster would be destroyed by battle.
